description: Represents an agent of CrewAI. Create AI agents with specific roles, goals, and capabilities.

goal.info: The objective of the agent - what it aims to accomplish

backstory.info: The backstory of the agent - context about its expertise and background

tools.info: Tools at agent's disposal to accomplish tasks

llm.info: Language model that will power the agent's reasoning and responses

memory.info: Whether the agent should have memory to remember previous interactions

allow_delegation.info: Whether the agent is allowed to delegate tasks to other agents

allow_code_execution.info: Whether the agent is allowed to execute code during task execution

kwargs.info: Additional keyword arguments for agent configuration

errors.import_failed: CrewAI is not installed. Please install it with `uv pip install crewai`.
